name: spyMod
title: Spy mod
author: Maxikaaz
description:
Spy mod is intended for multiplayer use with multiple forces. It boosts technologies of all forces (even those which don't exist yet); when one of forces finish research.

The purpose of this is so that new joining players won't be so far behind in tech for long.

It's intended to use in combination with more expensive technologies.

One player will make technological breakthrough -> rest have easier path to follow.
